channel.title: Where would i add this?

item.title: Where would i add this?
item.dc:creator: @adam2348 adam2348
item.description:
@adam2348 wrote:

dont’ forget after u add those, to put the code in the item on item to call the voids,
one way to add them in, is to look for another public void, and right before it paste all that

Read full topic

item.title: Where would i add this?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You put it anywhere under

public class client extends players implements runnable{

but NOT after another {.

Read full topic

item.title: Where would i add this?
item.dc:creator: @gungamma gungamma
item.description:
@gungamma wrote:

where would i add these voids?

Now we are going to add the actualy use item on item

Add these voids

Code:
///////////////////TRIMMING///////////////////////
public void llt()
{
if(playerLevel[24] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(1804, 1) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(1097, 1) == false))
{
sendMessage(“You DON’T HAVE the NEEDED SUPPLIES”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(1804, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1097, 1) == true))
{

deleteItem(1097, getItemSlot(1097), 1);
addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[24]), 24);
addItem(7368, 1);
sendMessage(“You Create A Studded Leather Chaps (t)”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 1)
{
sendMessage(“You need 1 trimming dude!”);
}
}
}
